62  bgpstream_peer_id_t peer_id,

64  bgpstream_addr_storage_t *peer_ip_addr,

69 KHASH_INIT(bgpstream_peer_sig_id_map,
70  bgpstream_peer_sig_t*,
71  bgpstream_peer_id_t,
72  1,
73  bgpstream_peer_sig_hash,
74  bgpstream_peer_sig_equal);
75 
77 KHASH_INIT(bgpstream_peer_id_sig_map,
78  bgpstream_peer_id_t,
79  bgpstream_peer_sig_t*,
80  1,
81  kh_int_hash_func,
82  kh_int_hash_equal);
83 
85 struct bgpstream_peer_sig_map {
86  khash_t(bgpstream_peer_sig_id_map) * ps_id;
87  khash_t(bgpstream_peer_id_sig_map) * id_ps;
88 };
89 
90 
91 
92 /* PRIVATE FUNCTIONS (static) */
93 
94 static void sig_free(bgpstream_peer_sig_t *sig)
95 {
96  free(sig);
97 }
98 
99 static bgpstream_peer_id_t bgpstream_peer_sig_map_set_and_get_ps(
100  bgpstream_peer_sig_map_t *map,
101  bgpstream_peer_sig_t *ps)
102 {
103  khiter_t k;
104  int khret;
105  bgpstream_peer_id_t next_id = kh_size(map->id_ps) + 1;
106  if((k = kh_get(bgpstream_peer_sig_id_map, map->ps_id, ps)) ==
107  kh_end(map->ps_id))
108  {
109  k = kh_put(bgpstream_peer_sig_id_map, map->ps_id, ps, &khret);
110  kh_value(map->ps_id,k) = next_id;
111  k = kh_put(bgpstream_peer_id_sig_map, map->id_ps, next_id, &khret);
112  kh_value(map->id_ps,k) = ps;
113 
114  return next_id;
115  }
116  else {
117  /* already exists... */
118  free(ps); /* it was mallocd for us...*/
119  return kh_value(map->ps_id,k);
120  }
121  return 0;
122 }
123 
124 
125 /* PROTECTED FUNCTIONS (_int.h) */
126 
127 
128 khint64_t bgpstream_peer_sig_hash(bgpstream_peer_sig_t *ps)
129 {
130  /* assuming that the number of peers that have the same ip and belong to two
131  * different collectors is low (in this specific case there will be a
132  * collision in terms of hash). */
133  return bgpstream_addr_storage_hash(&ps->peer_ip_addr);
134 }
135 
138 int bgpstream_peer_sig_equal(bgpstream_peer_sig_t *ps1,
139  bgpstream_peer_sig_t *ps2)
140 {
141  return (bgpstream_addr_storage_equal(&ps1->peer_ip_addr, &ps2->peer_ip_addr) &&
142  (strcmp(ps1->collector_str,ps2->collector_str) == 0));
143 }
144 
145 
146 
147 /* PUBLIC FUNCTIONS */
148 
149 bgpstream_peer_sig_map_t *bgpstream_peer_sig_map_create()
150 {
151  bgpstream_peer_sig_map_t *map = NULL;
152  if((map =
153  (bgpstream_peer_sig_map_t *)malloc_zero(sizeof(bgpstream_peer_sig_map_t)))
154  == NULL)
155  {
156  return NULL;
157  }
158 
159  if((map->ps_id = kh_init(bgpstream_peer_sig_id_map)) == NULL)
160  {
161  goto err;
162  }
163 
164  if((map->id_ps = kh_init(bgpstream_peer_id_sig_map)) == NULL)
165  {
166  goto err;
167  }
168 
169  return map;
170 
171  err:
172  bgpstream_peer_sig_map_destroy(map);
173  return NULL;
174 }
175 
176 bgpstream_peer_id_t bgpstream_peer_sig_map_get_id(bgpstream_peer_sig_map_t *map,
177  char *collector_str,
178  bgpstream_ip_addr_t *peer_ip_addr,
179  uint32_t peer_asnumber)
180 {
181  bgpstream_peer_sig_t *new_ps;
182  if((new_ps = malloc(sizeof(bgpstream_peer_sig_t))) == NULL)
183  {
184  return -1;
185  }
186 
187 
188  new_ps->peer_ip_addr.version = peer_ip_addr->version;
189  switch(peer_ip_addr->version)
190  {
191  case BGPSTREAM_ADDR_VERSION_IPV4:
192  memcpy(&new_ps->peer_ip_addr.ipv4.s_addr,
193  &((bgpstream_ipv4_addr_t *)peer_ip_addr)->ipv4.s_addr,
194  sizeof(uint32_t));
195  break;
196  case BGPSTREAM_ADDR_VERSION_IPV6:
197  memcpy(&new_ps->peer_ip_addr.ipv6.s6_addr,
198  &((bgpstream_ipv6_addr_t *)peer_ip_addr)->ipv6.s6_addr,
199  sizeof(uint8_t)*16);
200  break;
201  default:
202  /* programming error */
203  assert(0);
204  }
205 
206  strcpy(new_ps->collector_str, collector_str);
207  new_ps->peer_asnumber = peer_asnumber;
208 
209  return bgpstream_peer_sig_map_set_and_get_ps(map,new_ps);
210 }
211 
212 bgpstream_peer_sig_t *bgpstream_peer_sig_map_get_sig(
213  bgpstream_peer_sig_map_t *map,
214  bgpstream_peer_id_t id)
215 {
216  bgpstream_peer_sig_t *ps = NULL;
217  khiter_t k;
218  if((k = kh_get(bgpstream_peer_id_sig_map, map->id_ps, id)) !=
219  kh_end(map->id_ps))
220  {
221  ps = kh_value(map->id_ps,k);
222  }
223  return ps;
224 }
225 
226 int bgpstream_peer_sig_map_get_size(bgpstream_peer_sig_map_t *map)
227 {
228  assert(kh_size(map->id_ps) == kh_size(map->ps_id));
229  return kh_size(map->id_ps);
230 }
231 
232 void bgpstream_peer_sig_map_destroy(bgpstream_peer_sig_map_t *map)
233 {
234  if(map != NULL)
235  {
236  if(map->ps_id != NULL)
237  {
238  kh_destroy(bgpstream_peer_sig_id_map, map->ps_id);
239  map->ps_id = NULL;
240  }
241  if(map->id_ps != NULL)
242  {
243  /* only call free vals on ONE map, they are shared */
244  kh_free_vals(bgpstream_peer_id_sig_map, map->id_ps, sig_free);
245  kh_destroy(bgpstream_peer_id_sig_map, map->id_ps);
246  map->id_ps = NULL;
247  }
248  free(map);
249  }
250 }
251 
252 void bgpstream_peer_sig_map_clear(bgpstream_peer_sig_map_t *map)
253 {
254  /* only call free vals on ONE map, they are shared */
255  kh_free_vals(bgpstream_peer_id_sig_map, map->id_ps, sig_free);
256  kh_clear(bgpstream_peer_id_sig_map, map->id_ps);
257  kh_clear(bgpstream_peer_sig_id_map, map->ps_id);
258 }
